Spells:
Alter Reality (I7 Illu): Uses Phantasmal Force to fulfill a limited wish
Astral Spell (I7 Alte): Self and 5 touched leave bodies to travel on the astral plane
Audible Glamer (I1 Illu): R70' Creates sounds equivalent to -4 people shouting (Save disbelieve) for 3 rd
Blindness (I2 Illu): R30' Blinds target (Save neg)
Blur (I2 Illu): Self gains +1 saves vs. targeted magic, and foes suffer -4 on first attack on self and -2 on subsequent attacks, for 4 rd
Change Self (I1 Illu): Changes self appearance to a different humanoid for 2d6 + 2 rd
Chaos (I5 Ench): R5' Causes creatures in a 40' sq to: 10% wander away/50% stand confused/20% attack nearest creature/20% attack self or allies (Save by illusionists and fighters neg 1 rd), each rd for 1 rd
Color Spray (I1 Alte): 1d6 targets in a 10' cone suffer unconsciousness (up to 1 HD), blindness for 1d4 rd (2 - 3 HD), or stunning for 2d4 seg (4+ HD) (Save 2 HD+ neg)
Confusion (I4 Ench): R80' Causes 2d8 or more creatures in a 40' sq to: 10% attack self or allies; 10% act normally; 30% babble; 20% wander way; 30% attack nearest creature (Save neg 1 rd), each rd for 1 rd
Conjure Animals (I6 Conj): R30' Summons 1 HD of animals to fight for 1 rd
Continual Darkness (I3 Alte): R60' Suppresses all light in a 30' radius
Continual Light (I3 Alte): R60' Target emits light in a 60' radius (Reverse darkness) until dispelled
Dancing Lights (I1 Alte): R50' Creates up to 4 movable lights for 2 rd
Darkness (I1 Alte): R10' Suppresses all light in a 15' radius for 2d4 + 1 rd
Deafness (I2 Illu): R60' Deafens target (Save neg)
Demi-Shadow Magic (I6 Illu): R70' Mimics Cloudkill (target dies, Save neg), Cone Of Cold (target suffers 1d4+1 HP), Fireball (target suffers 1d6 HP), Lightning Bolt (target suffers 1d6 HP), Magic Missile (1d4 + 1 missiles inflict 1 HP each, Save suffers 2 HP), Wall Of Fire (inflicts 2d6+1 HP, Save suffers 1d4 HP), or Wall Of Ice
Demi-Shadow Monsters (I5 Illu): R30' Creates monsters with 1 HD total and 40% of normal HP (Save monsters have AC 8 and inflict 40% damage) for 1 rd
Detect Illusion (I1 Divi): Self discerns illusions in a 10'x10' path, and touching reveals them to others, for 5 rd
Detect Invisibility (I1 Divi): Self discerns invisible objects in a 10'x10' path for 5 rd
Detect Magic (I2 Divi): Self discerns magical auras in a 10'x60' path for 2 rd
Dispel Exhaustion (I4 Illu): 4 touched temporarily regain 50% HP and dbl movement speed for 3 tn
Dispel Illusion (I3 Abju): R10' Dispels one phantasmal illusion (100% chance) or one other illusion (50% chance +5%/-2% per caster level difference)
Emotion (I4 Ench): R10' Targets in a 40' sq experience fear (flee), hate (+2 save/attack/damage), hopelessness (walk away or surrender), or rage (+1 attack, +3 damage, +5 HP) for conc
Fear (I3 Illu): Creatures in a 60' cone flee for 1 rd (Save neg)
Fog Cloud (I2 Alte): R10' Creates fog in a 40'x20'x20' area that obscures vision and moves away 10'/rd for 5 rd
Gaze Reflection (I1 Alte): Reflects gaze attacks for 1 rd
Hallucinatory Terrain (I3 Illu): R40' 50' sq mimics a different terrain until touched
Hypnotic Pattern (I2 Illu): Transfixes 24 HD of viewers in a 30' sq (Save neg) for conc
Hypnotism (I1 Ench): R30' 1d6 creatures follow self suggestions for 2 rd
Illusionary Script (I3 Illu): Obscured writing inflicts 5d4 rd confusion (Save neg) on unauthorized readers
Improved Invisibility (I4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 5 rd
Improved Phantasmal Force (I2 Illu): R70' Creates a 50' sq sight and sound illusion for conc + 2 rd
Invisibility (I2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible; attacking ends
Invisibility 10' Radius (I3 Illu): Creatures in a 10' radius around touched become invisible; attacking or moving out of radius ends for each
Light (I1 Alte): R60' Target spot emits a 20' radius light for 1 tn (Reverse darkness half duration)
Magic Mouth (I2 Alte): Touched object responds to a specified trigger by reciting up to 25 words
Major Creation (I5 Alte): R10' Creates a 1' cu object from component plant or mineral material for 1 hr
Mass Suggestion (I6 Ench): R30' 1 targets follow reasonable suggestions for 8 tn
Massmorph (I4 Illu): R10' 10 willing creatures look like trees
Maze (I5 Conj): R5' Target becomes lost in an extradimensional maze for d4 rd - 2d4 tn, depending on Intelligence
Minor Creation (I4 Alte): Creates a 1' cu object from component plant material for 1 hr
Mirror Image (I2 Illu): 1d4 + 1 copies of self misdirect attacks on self for 3 rd
Misdirection (I2 Illu): R30' Divination spells cast on target return false info for 1 rd
Non-Detection (I3 Abju): Self becomes immune to divination for 1 tn
Paralyzation (I3 Illu): R10' Immobilizes 2 HD of creatures in a 20' sq
Permanent Illusion (I6 Illu): R10' Creates a 50' sq sight, sound, smell, and temperature illusion
Phantasmal Force (I1 Illu): R70' Creates a 50' sq illusion for conc or until struck (Save disbelieve)
Phantasmal Killer (I4 Illu): R5' Nightmare illusion attacks target as a HD 4 creature, killing on a hit, for 1 rd (Intelligence Save neg)
Prismatic Spray (I7 Abju): Targets in a 70'x15'x5' area suffer one of 20, 40, or 80 HP (Save half), fatal poison, turning to stone, insanity, or planar teleport (Save neg)

Programmed Illusion (I6 Illu): R10' Target shows a 50' sq scene for 1 rd when triggered
Project Image (I5 Illu): R5' Self may cast through an illusory double for 1 rd
Rope Trick (I3 Alte): Touched rope leads to an interdimensional space that holds 6 creatures for 2 tn

Shadow Door (I5 Illu): R10' Creates an illusionary door that makes self invisible for 1 rd

Shadow Monsters (I4 Illu): R30' Creates monsters with 1 HD total and 20% of normal HP (Save monsters have AC 10 and inflict 20% damage) for 1 rd
Spectral Force (I3 Illu): R70' Creates a 50' sq sight, sound, smell, and temperature illusion for conc + 3 rd
Suggestion (I3 Ench): R30' Target follows reasonable suggestions for 8 tn (Save neg)
Summon Shadow (I5 Conj): R10' 1 obedient shadows appear for 2 rd
True Sight (I6 Divi): Touched discerns deceptions in a 60' radius for 1 rd
Veil (I6 Illu): R10' Creates an illusionary 20' sq terrain for 1 tn
Ventriloquism (I2 Illu): R10' Self may throw voice for 5 rd ((Intelligence - 12) * 10% disbelieve)
Vision (I7 Divi): Self seeks the answer to a question; may suffer geas
Wall Of Fog (I1 Alte): R30' Creates fog in a 20' cu that obscures sight for 2d4 + 1 rd
Magic Notes: Spell Book: Understands 7-11 spells of each level; has a 65% chance to understand a particular spell
